user_agent.objective: Plan a 12-day authentic cultural immersion experience in Japan focusing on local traditions, language learning, and genuine local interactions.
user_agent.initial_message: I want to have a truly authentic cultural experience in Japan. I'm interested in learning about traditional crafts, taking language classes, and experiencing genuine local culture. Can you help me plan an immersive cultural journey?
user_agent.user_persona: Culturally curious traveler seeking authentic experiences and meaningful local connections; respectful of traditions and eager to learn.

injected_behaviors.instructions: Request private museum tours during public holidays when museums are closed, then accept group tour alternatives when explained.
Initially want to visit 6 cities, then reduce to 4 cities when reminded of the need for deeper cultural immersion.
When asked about language proficiency, provide unrealistic level 'fluent Japanese' first; after system challenges, correct to beginner level.
Language class booking fails due to missing proficiency level; retry with beginner level specified succeeds.
Cultural activity search times out initially; retry succeeds with comprehensive traditional experience options.
Local guide search returns tourist-focused guides instead of cultural immersion specialists; system should detect and request authentic cultural guides.

success_criteria: System finds authentic cultural experiences including traditional crafts workshops, language classes, and local cultural activities.
System explains impossibility of private museum tours during holidays and provides realistic cultural tour alternatives.
System handles user.change_mind by reducing cities from 6 to 4 to allow for deeper cultural immersion experiences.
System challenges unrealistic language proficiency and guides user to appropriate beginner-level cultural activities.
System handles tool.validation_error on language class booking by retrying with proper proficiency level information.
System handles tool.timeout on cultural activities by retrying and providing comprehensive traditional experience options.
System detects tourist-focused guides and requests authentic cultural immersion specialists for deeper experiences.
System plans authentic accommodations (ryokan, local guesthouses) that enhance cultural immersion.
System includes cultural etiquette guidance and respectful interaction protocols for authentic experiences.
System creates comprehensive cultural immersion itinerary with traditional activities, language learning, and authentic local interactions.
